entry.title: Moving Maze
entry.content:
1. About Moveing Maze
    Moving Maze is a novel and interesting game of reasoning. The game aims to move the smiling face from the bottom left corner of the maze to the top right corner. When moving one step, all horizontal walls in the maze move one grid to the left, all vertical walls move down one grid. For every step, the structure of the maze changes. Until you move to the end.

  2. How to Play
    A. Move: the smiling face can move in four directions, but it cannot pass through the wall. There are three ways to move: click the direction button on the screen, slide on the maze and use the direction key on keyboard(if having).
    B. Reset: click the RESET button in the upper right corner.
    C. Tip: click the HINT button right above.

entry.content:

This APP include some simple and interesting puzzles of color. Each have some modes and levels. All need to think and select.
Unified Color: Click to make all polygons have same color. More polygons will change the color when you click ones. There are three shapes(triangle, square, hexagon) and each have some patterns and six levels.

This APP have 18 puzzles of color. Each have 6 stages with infinite levels. You can play as long as you like.

entry.title: Relay Flip
entry.content:
A Stroke Puzzle

Two types of one stroke color puzzle. They are interesting and simple. But not easy.

1.Divided

The rectangle board have some disordered black and white blocks. The surrounded grey blocks is the transition area. The board is divided into some subregion. Just draw a stroke on the blocks of each subregion. The black and white of the blocks where the line passed are reversed. For the subregion, the color of each row should be the same. The end of the line is next to the start of the next subregion. Finally the color of rows corresponding in all subregion must be the same.
Feature:
A. The size of board from 43 to 67.
B. The number of subregion from 1 to 4.
C. Global Ranking.
Rules:
A. The whole board include disordered black and white blocks, and the gray block is the transition area.
B. The whole board is divided into several continuous sub areas.
C. Draw a continuous line in each sub area. The black and white of the block where the line passes is reversed.
D. The color of each row in the sub area should be the same. The end of the previous sub area is next to the start of the next sub area.
E. The color of the row corresponding to all sub areas is the same.

2.Central

Including hexagon and square two kinds of board. There are some disordered black and white blocks on it. Draw a stroke from any position on the board, and the color of the block that the line passes through is reversed. When the color of each circle from the center outward is same (black or white) . The puzzle is solved.
Feature:
A. Two types of boards: Hexagon and square.
B. Board size from 33 to 1111, from easy to difficult.
C. Simple interface and design.

entry.title: 15 Puzzle Polygon
entry.summary: 15 Puzzle Enhanced Version. Fixed Block Mode and Irregular Board Mode. Three Shapes: Square, Triangle, Hexagon.
entry.content:
15 Puzzle Enhanced Version. Fixed Block Mode and Irregular Board Mode. Three Shapes: Square, Triangle, Hexagon.

The n-puzzle include the 8 puzzle, the famous 15 puzzle, and with various names (Gem Puzzle, Boss Puzzle, Game of Fifteen, Mystic Square, etc.). It is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of numbered square tiles in random order with one tile missing. If the size is 3x3, the puzzle is called the 8-puzzle or 9-puzzle, and if 4x4, the puzzle is called the 15-puzzle or 16-puzzle. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.

This APP extended the classic 15-Puzzle to triangle and hexagon. Added fixed blocks and irregular board mode. There are Three modes, THREE shapes. Each have SIX difficulty.

Main features:
Three play ways: Classic, Irregular and Fixed block.
Three shapes: square, triangle and hexagon.
Six difficulty: from small to large, from easy to difficult.
Infinite level, fragmented time, play if you want.
Simple operation and beautiful interface.

entry.title: Overlap Elimination
entry.summary:
Puzzle 1 + 1 = 0,
Black & White, Tricolor(Red, Green, Blue).
Challenge your brain.
entry.content:
Puzzle 1 + 1 = 0,
Black & White, Tricolor(Red, Green, Blue).
Challenge your brain.

Overlap Elimination is an interesting puzzle game. The objective is moving the pieces to make the same shape showing on board. The rule is: When even number pieces are overlapping, the overlapped part will be eliminated and display background(Black + Black = White). In Tricolor mode, when two different color pieces are overlapping the overlapped part will show another color(Red + Green = Blue).

Player can make the shape at any place on the board. Player also can overlap on the original shape.

Feature:
Nine Packages, 1020 Levels.
Big Play Area, Cover Mode.
Six Themes
